document.full_text: the longer italian carmaker fiat spa  waits to add to its stake in chrysler group llc, the more expensive the purchase will be, the chief executive of both companies said on wednesday.
document.title: delay makes chrysler stake buy costlier: fiat ceo
lines_and_colors: the longer italian carmaker fiat spa  waits to add to its stake in chrysler group llc, the more expensive the purchase will be, the chief executive of both companies said on wednesday.
